name: Roots of Evil (PhobosRandom)
description:
_____________________________________________________________

 Summary

The elder malefic trees has spoken and wants you to sacrifice living beeing so his roots and his corruption can spread in the land. Capture wandering animals and kill them in the glory of your master!

 Controls

Movement -> W.A.S.D

Sprint -> Left Shift

Capture animal -> E

Sacrifice animal -> E

Keep animal -> Q

 Disclaimer
  • All visuals are from the Unity Assets Store
  • All sound are either made by me or free to use

_____________________________________________________________

 Credits
